author: alexandair
body:
Added newlines following one-sentence-per-line principle.
Fixed typos.
Removed commercial resources from "More Reading" section.
Implemented Joey's suggestions.

comments.author: jianyunt
comments.body: @joeyaiello, @HemantMahawar @khansen00  any updates on whether we should include these commercial based learning materials? Hitesh thinks we should, but create a separate category, like "Commercial reading materials".  i think that's fine.

comments.author: alexandair
comments.body: @jianyunt Can you merge it, please? We can always add commercial links later.

title: Added newlines. Removed commercial resources.
